other_tests.findings: Extensive colonic diverticulosis. Mural thickening with pericolonic stranding and inflamed diverticula noted within proximal transverse colon at the hepatic flexure consistent with acute uncomplicated diverticulitis. Complex 3.8 x 2.0 x 3.6 cm cystic structure in the left adnexa which may represent a left hematosalpinx versus an ovarian hemorrhagic cyst, noted to be new/increased in size since a previous MR pelvis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased size of the cystic structure in the left adnexa since the previous MR pelvis.
